# Tenzro Cortex

**Universal LLM Training Platform** - Train any model, any task, any hardware.

[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Apache_2.0-blue.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/Apache-2.0)

## Quick Start

```bash
# Install
pip install tenzro-cortex

# Login
tenzro auth login

# Train
tenzro train --model microsoft/phi-2 --data training.jsonl
```

## Features

- ✅ **Any Model** - 1000+ HuggingFace models
- ✅ **LoRA Fine-tuning** - Parameter-efficient training
- ✅ **Distributed** - Multi-GPU, multi-node
- ✅ **OpenAI API** - Compatible inference

## Documentation

https://docs.tenzro.network
